name: Finding Susan
description:
Made with love at Global Game Jam 2018.

Your dog, Susan, is lost. Luckily, you have a PHD in theoretical neuroscience and invented a machine to track your dog through his memories. Search through the static in order to find the good memories you and Susan shared together and locate him.

Credits: 

  • James Iwamasa - [Programming]
  • Hughe Vang - [Audio]
  • Charisse Lo - [Art]
  • Lyn Kline - [Art]
  • Courtney Chavez - [Art]
